name: Not on my watch!
description:
Hero-Man fights crime all day, but now he's tired! Protect him while he catches up on his sleep, but be careful, minions are coming...

If the web version doesn't work, try with crhome, or download a desktop export.

Controls

- move with WASD or Arrows keys, hit with SPACE or Left click
- move to the next part of the dialogue with SPACE

Attributions Fonts

- Pixel Caps by Mirz (Michelle Lehman)

Art

My own.

Sound effects

Generated with BFXR.

Music

Made with Bosca Coeil.

Code

If you're interested, it's open source here.
